title: Hammam Linen White Bath Towels 4-Pack - 27x54 Soft and Absorbent, Premium Quality Perfect for Daily Use 100% Cotton Towel 600 GSM
descriptions:
Hammam Linen White Bath Towels – 4-Pack

- What you get: Four large towels, each 27 by 54 inches. Color: white. Material: 100% cotton.
- How they feel: Very soft and gentle on the skin.
- How they work: Thick and absorbent (600 GSM), but still light enough to handle. They soak up water well and dry quickly.
- Built to last: Strong double-stitched edges help prevent fraying.
- Where to use them: Perfect for your bathroom at home. Also the kind of quality used in nice hotels. Good for the pool, beach, gym, spa, salon, dorms, or as a gift.

Easy care:
- Machine washable. You can put them in the dryer.
- They dry faster than many thick towels, helping save energy.
- Lint will lessen after a few washes. Clean your dryer’s lint trap.
- Try to keep towels away from face creams or skin treatments, which can leave marks. Always follow the label on the towel.

Why you’ll like them:
- Soft on sensitive skin.
- Absorb water quickly, so you get dry faster.
- Not too heavy to carry or hang.
- Durable, so they hold up wash after wash.
- Clean, classic white that looks fresh in any bathroom.

Simple choice for comfort, quality, and ease—Hammam Linen White Bath Towels in a handy set of four.
